byline.contributor: Louise Story contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: The Justice Department complaint alleges that the money was stolen from a Malaysian government investment fund that Prime Minister Najib Razak oversaw.

headline.print_headline: Justice Dept. Rejects Account of How Malaysia’s Leader Acquired Millions
headline.main: Justice Dept. Rejects Account of How Malaysia’s Leader Acquired Millions

snippet: The Justice Department complaint alleges that the money was stolen from a Malaysian government investment fund that Prime Minister Najib Razak oversaw....
abstract: Justice Dept files complaint in federal court asserting hundreds of millions of dollars that appeared in personal bank account of Malaysian Prime Min Najib Razak were stolen from government investment fund 1Malaysia Development Berhad; assertion directly contradicts Najib's claims and could strengthen push to remove him from office.
